name: riddles
synopsis: You are a curious explorer known for finding hidden treasures and solving riddles. One day, while walking through the enchanted forest, you encounter a gleaming bird that speaks in riddles.

progresses.description: The bird says to you: "To find the treasure you seek, you must first solve my riddle: 'What has roots that nobody sees, is taller than trees, and climbs, climbs, but never grows?'"

choices.title: answer 'mountain'
choices.response: The bird smiles and says: "Very well! The treasure is near. Follow the left path at the upcoming fork."

choices.title: answer 'river'
choices.response: The bird frowns and says: "Wrong answer. But I will give you another chance. The treasure can still be yours if you find the old sage of the forest. But you must defeat me first!"

progresses.description: You arrive at a fork with two paths. You must choose wisely

choices.title: follow the left path
choices.response: You find a treasure chest buried under a giant tree. Upon opening it, you discover an ancient map leading to an unknown kingdom. Since you're a foreigner, you was made slave and now your life is gone.

choices.title: follow the right path
choices.response: You end up in a field full of magical flowers that emit a hypnotic melody. The flowers are actually guardians of the treasure, and they lead you to a hidden cave filled with gold and jewels.

progresses.description: With the treasure in hand, you, become a legend among explorers. Many others come to try their luck, but few have the success you did. Now, a new mystery awaits you, but that is a story for another day...
